title: Someone Like You (SLY)
summary: Data-backed quiz that compares your answers with the community to highlight unexpected similarities.
highlights: API test suite with Mocha + Supertest
problem: People often feel isolated in their opinions and needed a playful way to see how their perspectives overlap with others.
approach: Created an accessible React experience that walks users through statistically weighted questions, persists responses through a Node/Express API, and aggregates cohort data in PostgreSQL. Comprehensive integration tests verify scoring, similarity calculations, and data privacy rules.
results: Delivers personalized insights immediately after quiz completion
Maintains anonymized response sets while reporting shared traits
Modular question framework makes adding new topics a single config change
